FuncDef: This command configures the Relay Agent Information Option (Option 82) processing.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the DHCP Relay reforwarding policy action. Values-replace - In the upstream direction (from the user), the Option 82 field from the router is inserted in the packet (overwriting any existing Option 82 field). In the downstream direction (toward the user) the Option 82 field is stripped (in accordance with RFC 3046)..

ExtraInfo: Default: The default is to keep the existing information intact.
